overview_of_class: Students will learn the anatomy and physiology of normal swallowing and the anatomic and physiologic disturbances that affect deglutition. Students will acquire fundamental skills in radiographic and bedside diagnostic and treatment procedures. Clinical decision-making and care planning processes based in research evidence and evaluation findings will be discussed. Students will complete laboratory experiences in evaluation procedures and restorative interventions.
name: Swallow Physiology and Pathology
subject: CSD
